maqras.text: Prout pro righteous when they asked Quod perfecit vos think de these revelations ex tuus Dominus they dictus Bonus. those lead righteous vita happiness; abode Hereafter est et bonus! Quod blissful abode pro the righteous
gardens Eden reserved them wherein rivers flow They habet anything they wish therein. DEUS SIC rewards the righteous
angels terminate their vita in dictus righteousness dictus Pax est vos! Iniit Paradise (statim) prout reward tuus works
they waiting angels est advenit them alias tuus Dominus judgment advenit pass Those ante them perfecit same thing! DEUS EST UNUS wronged them; they est UNUS wronged their suus ANIMA
They incurred consequences their malus works very things they ridiculed advenit haunt them

idol worshipers dictus Habet DEUS willed nos non worship any idols Eum nor would noster parentes! Nor would nos prohibit anything His prohibitions. Those ante them perfecit the same messengers potuit anything perfecit deliver perfecit message
Nos sent messenger omnis community dictus Vos worship DEUS avoid idolatry. Subsequently some est guided de DEUS dum others committed straying Roam terra note consequences rejectors
Non matter quam hard vos try guide them DEUS non guide the unus He committed straying Sic non 1 help them
They juravit solemnly DEUS "DEUS testimentum non resurrect denatus Absolutely such est His inviolable promise multus people non know
He tunc point everyone totus things they disputed let those disbelieved know ut they est liars
To habet anything perfecit nos simply dictus to Est it est
Those emigrated DEUS they persecuted nos surely factus it them generously in hoc vita recompense Hereafter est et major they unus knew
Hoc est because they steadfastly persevere in their Dominus they trust
Nos non send vos vir nos inspired Ask those know scripture vos non know
Nos provisus them proofs scriptures. Nos sent down vos hoc message proclaim people everything sent down them perhaps they reflect
those scheme malus schemes guarantee ut DEUS testimentum non causa terra perfecit to swallow them ut retribution non advenit them when they minus expect it
It strike them dum they est asleep they nunquam escape
it strike them dum they fearfully expecting it Tuus Dominus est Compassionate Merciful
they non vide totus things habuit created DEUS? Their shadows surround them statim sinister in total submission to DEUS ac willingly
To DEUS prostrates everything caelum everything on terra! - Omnis creature - Ac ita perfecit angels; parvus arrogance
They reverence their Dominus high supra them they perfecit quod they commanded perfecit
